tours.name: Safari Adventure in Maasai Mara
tours.description: Experience the thrill of a safari in one of Africa's most famous national reserves. Witness the Big Five and marvel at the stunning landscapes.

tours.name: Serengeti National Park
tours.description: Renowned for its vast savannahs, teeming with wildlife during the annual Great Migration of wildebeest and zebra, offering unparalleled opportunities for safari experiences and wildlife photography.

tours.name: Tsavo National Parks
tours.description: Tsavo National Parks comprise Tsavo East and Tsavo West, collectively the largest national park in Kenya, famous for its vast wilderness, diverse wildlife, and iconic red elephants.

tours.name: Kilimanjaro National Park
tours.description: It offers diverse ecosystems ranging from lush rainforests to alpine deserts, attracting adventurers and nature enthusiasts alike

tours.name: Mount Kenya Hiking Expedition
tours.description: Embark on a challenging yet rewarding trek to the summit of Mount Kenya, Africa's second-highest mountain.

tours.name: Cultural Tour of Nairobi
tours.description: Explore the vibrant culture and history of Nairobi, including visits to museums, markets, and local communities.
